channel.title: Questions
channel.description:
Hi im really new in Moparscape im dumb on reading guides or tutorials im playing in a empy server without anyone only spawing good items and killing rats and guards-.-
i changed the HP of npc's i changed KBD's hp into 99 but when i type ::npc 50(KBD) it appears with 0 HP what do i have to do? how do i do my own server so i can invite peeps or going killing some npc's? i'd like to make my own world so i can put things where i want. can i spawn not 1 but 1k chaos or deaths at a time? i need to do desert treasure quest to do ancient magicks?
thats all for now srry for bothering ill update this thread if i have new questions ty

item.title: Questions
item.dc:creator: @Raze Raze
item.description:
@Raze wrote:

but when i type ::npc 50(KBD) it appears with 0 HP

Chokes

Add your monsters via autospawn.cfg if you do it with the command , log out & back in they will be gone

Read full topic

item.title: Questions
item.dc:creator: @m0nsterb0ys m0nsterb0ys
item.description:
@m0nsterb0ys wrote:

ugh ancient magicks should be down on the left of the yellow happy face. There is no icon there but just click the empty button to the left of the happy face. if u know the runes id the type in this for ANY items

::pickup (item id) (amount you want of that item)

Example

::pickup 1045 2000000000 (gives 200m green phats)

ALSO THIS IS IMPORTANT!!! the item id HAS to be 4 numbers long! so if the tem id is like 503 the u gotta make it 0503 in order for it to work!

Read full topic
